channel.title: Silverstein
channel.description:
I was wondering if anybody here listens Silverstein?
My friend sent me couple of Silverstein songs and I loved them.
Silverstein is punk, so it's pretty neutral music I say, tought there are some yelling in songs so everybody might not like it.
I suggest you to *buy* songs called: My heroine My heroine (acoustic) Discovering the waterfront Call it karma and acoustic version for it too
Or just *buy* whole album Discovering the waterfront
So tell me what do you think about them?
More information about this band @[url=http://www.silversteinmusic.com/]http://www.silversteinmusic.com/[/url]

erm…silverstein isn’t even close to punk…it’s screamo

item.title: Silverstein
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

What do you think about song Smashed into pieces?

I think it would be good song without those yelling, or atleast they should yell better in it. It sounds like someone is pulling cats tail. But I think it’s not that bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Silverstein
item.dc:creator: @Kryptizzler Kryptizzler
item.description:
@Kryptizzler wrote:

Love 'em. I bought the album Discovering the Waterfront and it’s awesome. However, I categorise it as post-hardcore.
